== Amone (626758) ==
      
Amone is a village in the [[Bicholim]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 734.06 hectares and harbouring 694 households with total population of 2963 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[SANQUELIM]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 1482 and female population is 1481. Scheduled Caste Population is 15 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 626758<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
